update business_time
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mode = #{mode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
timeout = #{timeout,jdbcType=INTEGER},
date_start = #{dateStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
date_end = #{dateEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

gmt_end = #{gmtEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
weekdays = #{weekdays,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update business_time set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mode = #{mode,jdbcType=TINYINT}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, timeout = #{timeout,jdbcType=INTEGER}, date_start = #{dateStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, date_end = #{dateEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_start = #{gmtStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_end = #{gmtEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, weekdays = #{weekdays,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
